channel.title: Running server problem
channel.description: iv been adding some items latley and i got some errors running my server (none when compiling) [code]Starting Distant Lands on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 80" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:314) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:2492 Client type: low memory version UserId: 8249453 soulero is signing onto server. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:2493 Client type: low memory version UserId: 8249453 soulero is signing onto server. [client-2-soulero]: soulero is already online.[/code] please help me, i dont whant to remove them :(

item.title: Running server problem
item.dc:creator: @souleroo souleroo
item.description:
@souleroo wrote:

i dont really understand… i havent edited anything in the itemhandler just added items to class8 in client item.cfg and item.java please if you can help me post what do do in the reply

Read full topic

item.title: Running server problem
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

You were trying to convert a String to a numeric type, but it wasn’t in the correct format. A String must be ONLY NUMERIC to be converted to a numeric type like int or byte. Check for typos.

Read full topic

item.title: Running server problem
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

hmm, im always bad at those errors, but im pretty sure it means you’ve made an error in “itemhander.java”? idk, srry if i didnt help

item.title: Running server problem
item.dc:creator: @souleroo souleroo
item.description:
@souleroo wrote:

iv been adding some items latley and i got some errors running my server (none when compiling)

Starting Distant Lands on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 80" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:314) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:2492 Client type: low memory version UserId: 8249453 soulero is signing onto server. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:2493 Client type: low memory version UserId: 8249453 soulero is signing onto server. [client-2-soulero]: soulero is already online.
please help me, i dont whant to remove them
